Name: Kingstown
Description: The capital region, known for its vibrant port, colonial architecture, and the bustling capital city of Kingstown.

Name: Saint George
Description: A region that includes the capital city, known for its beautiful beaches, harbor, and the island s  administrative center.

Name: Grenadines
Description: A group of islands located south of Saint Vincent, famous for their stunning natural beauty, including pristine beaches and clear waters.
